name.title: Name
name.description: The display name for the platform as shown in the Homebridge UI.

apiKey.title: WeatherXM API Key
apiKey.description: Create an API key on WeatherXM PRO: Settings → API Keys (https://pro.weatherxm.com). Paste it here. The plugin will send it in the X-API-KEY header.

stationId.title: Station ID
stationId.description: Find it on WeatherXM PRO: Stations → select your station → Details. It is also visible in the station page URL.

apiCallsPerMonth.title: Maximum API calls per month
apiCallsPerMonth.description: Monthly API call limit (default 1000). The refresh interval is automatically computed from this value.
